summary: Seven portraits of different types of women.
cast: Shirley MacLaine|Peter Sellers|Elspeth March|Rossano Brazzi|Laurence Badie|Judith Magre|Catherine Samie|Zanie Campan|Robert Duranton|Vittorio Gassman|Clinton Greyn|Lex Barker|Elsa Martinelli|Robert Morley|Jessie Robins|Patrick Wymark|Adrienne Corri|Michael Brennan|Alan Arkin|Michael Caine|Anita Ekberg|Philippe Noiret|Georges Adet|Jacques Ciron|Paul Frees|Jacques Legras|Roger Lumont|Roger Trapp
title: Siete veces mujer
